title: Thendral Vanthu Theendum Pothu Lyrics From Avatharam
stanzas:
Thendral vandhu
theendum podhu
enna vannamo manasula

Thingal vandhu
kaayum podhu
enna vannamo nenappula

vandhu vandhu
pogudhammaa
ennamellaam
vannam ammaaa

Unmaiyamma
ulladha naanum sonne
ponnammaa chinna
kannae..

yavarum sollamalae
pookkalum vaasam veesudhu.
uravum illaamalae
iru manam yaedho pesudhu.

evarum sollamale
kuyilellaam
thaenaa paadudhu.
edhuvum illaamalae
manasellaam
inippa inikkudhu

oda neeroda
indha alagam adhupola
odam adhu odum
indha kaalam adhu pola

nelayaa nillaadhu
ninaivil varum nerangalae
thendral vandhu
theendum podhu ..

eeram vilundhaale
nilathilae ellam thulirkkudhu
nesam porandhalae
odambellaam yeno silirkudhu

aalam viludhaaga
aasaigal oonjal aadudhu
alaiyum ala pole
azhagellaam kolam podudhu..

kuyile kuyiliname
andha isaiyaa koovudhammaa
kiliye kili inamae
adhu kadhayaai pesudhammaa

Thendral vandhu
theendum podhu
enna vannamo manasula
Thingal vandhu
kaayum podhu
enna vannamo nenappula

vandhu vandhu pogudhammaa
ennamellaam
vannam ammaaa
ennagalukaethapadi
vannamellaam
maarum ammaa

unmaiyile ulladhu
enna enna vannangal
enna enna..
thendral vandhu..
